Method.name: getData
sendMail
Method.Description: 02.09.14 jk; odeslani emailu pres tridu util.email.cls
Method.Implementation:
; doplnit adresu dle pozadavku ; 18.04.11 jk; kontrola CAPTCHA jen pro neprihlasene uzivatele ; do emailu naplnit "Od" z ISU_100$$e s usrObj=$g(data("USER_OBJ")) if $isobject(usrObj) { } ; asi neprovedeme nic elseif '##class(i2.base.forms).checkCaptcha() ; kontrola captcha pro neprihlasene { s data("ERRORS")=$g(data("ERRORS"),"")_..tx("ERR_CAPTCHA") q } ; nasteveni brat z ciselniku cav podle pracoviste ; $$a pracoviste $b$ operace: email/ AUTOR(autor zaznamu) s data("emailR")=..getEmail(data("IDX")) ;w data("emailR") ;w data("IDX") if ($g(data("SURNAME"),"")="") { ; kontrola vyplnenosti prijmeni s data("ERRORS")=$g(data("ERRORS"),"")_" "_..tx("SURNAMEERR") q } if ($g(data("WORKPLACE"),"")="") { ; kontrola vyplnenosti pracoviste s data("ERRORS")=data("ERRORS")_" "_..tx("WORKPLACEERR") q } if ($g(data("EMAIL_V"),"")="") { ; kontrola vyplnenosti emailu s data("ERRORS")=$g(data("ERRORS"),"")_" "_..tx("EMAILERR") q } s sReplyTo=$g(data("EMAIL_V"),"") ; ziskame si email komu poslat kopii s:(sReplyTo="@") sReplyTo="" ; 02.09.14 jk; odeslani emailu pres tridu util.email.cls s bHtml=1 ; nastaveno napevno, puvodne to bylo v konfiguraci I2_EMAILS s sBody=..mailBody(.data,sReplyTo,bHtml) d ##class(util.emailgw).send($$$IPREF,sBody,,.ret,"contclaim",data("SUBJECT"),$$$GETLANGUAGE,,data("emailR"),,,sReplyTo) //s ret="sending disabled at source code level" ;;w !,"
"              ; vypsani dat
    ;;zw data
    ;;zw sReplyTo
    ;;zw sBody
    ;;w !,"
" if (ret="") { ; email se dobre odeslal, vypiseme hlasku a vymazeme formulare s sLinkRec=##class(i2.html.tpl).getPermalink2($$$GETICTX_"_un_epca*"_$p(data("IDX"),"*","2"),..tx("SEND_RECORD")) s:('$f(data("REPORTS"),..tx("SENDEMAILOK"))) data("REPORTS")=$g(data("REPORTS"),"")_..tx("SENDEMAILOK") _"
"_..tx("SEND_REC_TEXT")_" "_sLinkRec ; dobre oteslany email s data("REPLY")="@" ; vymazeme hodnoty s data("SUBJECT")="" s data("MESSAGE")="" d:(data("BIGDATA")="") ##class(content.stat).addClaim(.array,1) s data("STAV_ZADOSTI")="9" s data("DESCRIPTION")="" } else { ; email se neodeslal, vypiseme chybovou hlasku s data("ERRORS")=$g(data("REPORTS"),"")_..tx("SENDEMAILERROR")_"("_ret_")" } s data("SURNAME") = "" ; promazene formular s data("FIRSTNAME") = "" s data("WORKPLACE") = "" s data("EMAIL_V") = ""

Method.name: mailBody
Method.Description: 02.09.14 jk; zruseno cteni konfigurace MOFS, nastaven default format HTML 28.05.13 tt; zmeny v tele emailu a linku 25.05.13 tt; pridano textove zobrazeni linku pro vyzadani fulltextu
Method.Implementation:
s sBody="" ; link na zazan s sLinkRec=##class(i2.html.tpl).getPermalink2($$$GETICTX_"_un_epca*"_$p($p($p(data("IDX"),"*","2"),"*","1"),"#","1"),data("RECTITLE_Z")) ; 28.05.13 tt; zmeny v tele emailu a linku ; uzivatelsky pridane polozky formulare /*s sBody=sBody_##class(i2.email).TableLine(..tx("FIRSTNAME"),data("FIRSTNAME"),bHtml) ; jmeno s sBody=sBody_##class(i2.email).TableLine(..tx("SURNAME"),data("SURNAME"),bHtml) ; jmeno s sBody=sBody_##class(i2.email).TableLine(..tx("WORKPLACE"),data("WORKPLACE"),bHtml) ; jmeno s sBody=sBody_##class(i2.email).TableLine(..tx("EMAIL"),sReplyTo,bHtml) ; jmeno */ s sBody=sBody_##class(i2.email).TableLine(..tx("ZADATEL"),data("FIRSTNAME")_" "_data("SURNAME")_", "_data("WORKPLACE")_", "_sReplyTo,bHtml) ; jmeno s sBody=sBody_$$$strswap(##class(i2.email).TableLine(" "," ",bHtml),":","") s sBody=sBody_##class(i2.email).TableLine(..tx("MESSAGE"),data("MESSAGE"),bHtml) s sBody=sBody_##class(i2.email).TableLine(..tx("ZAZNAM"),$p($p($p(data("IDX"),"*","2"),"*","1"),"#","1")_" - "_sLinkRec,bHtml) ; zaznam ; 30.05.13 tt; pridany link na hnadle net s:($g(data("C60a"))'="") sBody=sBody_##class(i2.email).TableLine(..tx("HANDLE_NET"),""_data("C60a")_"",bHtml) ; jmeno s sBody=sBody_##class(i2.email).TableLine(..tx("SOUBOR"),data("FILE"),bHtml) ; jmeno ; pokud mame novy IPAC, pridame generovani linku s sBaseURL = ##class(i2.html.tpl).getBaseURL() ; www adresa do rootu stránek IPCu if ((data("REPO")'="")&&(data("KEY")'="")) { ; 03.03.23 tt; pokud mame data content serveru, posleme link s urlparams = "repo="_data("REPO")_"&key="_data("KEY")_"&idx="_data("IDX")_"&xemail="_sReplyTo_"&state=1" ; 28.05.13 tt; zmeneny parametry linku ; 25.05.13 tt; pridano textove zobrazeni linku pro vyzadani fulltextu /* s link = ""_..tx("APPROVAL")_"" _"
("_$$$strswap(sBaseURL_##class(i2.html.tpl).getLinkURL("cavclaimret",urlparams),"&","&")_")" */ s link = $$$strswap(sBaseURL_##class(i2.html.tpl).getLinkURL("cavclaimret",urlparams),"&","&") ; 30.05.13 tt; upraveny link s link = ""_link_"" s sBody=sBody_##class(i2.email).TableLine(..tx("SEND"),link,bHtml) } s:(bHtml) sBody=$$$CRLF_""_$$$CRLF_sBody_$$$CRLF_"
" q sBody

Method.name: sendMailFile
Method.Description:
odeslani emailu se souborem v priloze
vejde sem ze stranky linkovane v emailu
Method.Implementation:
; doplnit adresu dle pozadavku ; nasteveni brat z ciselniku cav podle pracoviste ; $$a pracoviste $b$ operace: email/ AUTOR(autor zaznamu) s data("emailR")=..getEmail(data("IDX")) ;w data("emailR") ;w data("IDX") if ($g(data("EMAIL_V"),"")="") { ; kontrola vyplnenosti emailu s data("ERRORS")=$g(data("ERRORS"),"")_" "_..tx("EMAILERR") q } ;w !,"
"              ; vypsani dat
  ;zw data
  ;zw array
  ;w !,"
" ; 02.09.14 jk; odeslani emailu pres tridu util.email.cls s bHtml=1 ; nastaveno napevno, puvodne to bylo v konfiguraci I2_EMAILS ; uzivatelsky pridane polozky formulare s sBody=##class(i2.email).TableLine(..tx("MESSAGE"),data("MESSAGE"),bHtml) ; zprava s:(bHtml) sBody=$$$CRLF_""_$$$CRLF_sBody_$$$CRLF_"
" ; path je cesta k souboru contentServeru s key=array("KEY") s path=##class(User.Util).sXlate("IMAGE_SERVER",array("repository"),"N",$$$IPREF,"b") s sPathSep=##class(User.Util).getPathSepp() if $e(path,$l(path))'=sPathSep { s path=path_sPathSep } s path=path_$e(key,1,2)_sPathSep_$e(key,3,99)_"."_array("extension") d ##class(util.emailgw).send($$$IPREF,sBody,,.ret,"contclaim",data("SUBJECT"),$$$GETLANGUAGE,,data("EMAIL_V"),,,,path) if (ret="") { ; email se dobre odeslal, vypiseme hlasku a vymazeme formulare s sLinkRec=##class(i2.html.tpl).getPermalink2($$$GETICTX_"_un_epca*"_array("t001"),..tx("SEND_RECORD")) s data("REPORTS")=$g(data("REPORTS"),"")_..tx("SENDEMAILOK") _"
"_..tx("SEND_REC_TEXT")_" "_sLinkRec ; dobre oteslany email s data("REPLY")="@" ; vymazeme hodnoty s data("SUBJECT")="" s data("MESSAGE")="" d ##class(content.stat).addClaim(.array,1) s data("STAV_ZADOSTI")="8" s data("DESCRIPTION")="" } else { ; email se neodeslal, vypiseme chybovou hlasku s data("ERRORS")=$g(data("REPORTS"),"")_..tx("SENDEMAILERROR")_"("_ret_")" } s data("SURNAME") = "" ; promazene formular s data("FIRSTNAME") = "" s data("WORKPLACE") = "" s data("EMAIL_V") = ""

Prostřednictvím níže dostupného formuláře jej můžete odeslat na email žadatele.
